property.name: mapred.task.profile.maps
property.description: Range of map tasks to profile. Empty string implies no profiling for maps

property.name: mapred.task.profile.reduces
property.description: Range of reduce tasks to profile. Empty string implies no profiling for reduces

property.name: mapred.task.profile.params
property.description: Parameters passed to task JVM to set up and control profiling. Note how we have used the value_delimitter tag to pass a different delimitter than the default comma because comma is part of the actual value string. IMPORTANT: the path to btrace-agent.jar and the .class script should be valid on all Hadoop slave nodes. The btrace_deploy.sh script can be used to compile and deploy the BTrace .class file to all slaves.

property.name: io.sort.factor
property.description: The number of streams to merge at once while sorting files. This determines the number of open file handles.

property.name: io.file.buffer.size
property.description: The size of buffer for use in sequence files. The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is buffered during read and write operations.

property.name: mapred.child.java.opts
property.description: Java opts for the task tracker child processes
